title: UTXO Alliance
header.title: Complete cross-chain collaboration
who.title: Who we are
who.content:
The UTXO Alliance is a blockchain-focused, asset-agnostic initiative, created to kickstart collaboration across blockchains with shared characteristics.

Our aim is to tap into the power of Unspent Transaction Outputs (UTXOs) to ensure a more secure, stable, and scalable web3 landscape.

We also want to improve the way digital assets are exchanged. The more interoperability everyone has between blockchains using the same protocols, the more value we can derive from all of them.
what.title: What we’re doing
what.content:
The UTXO Alliance was created to ensure anyone can safely share digital assets, such as coins, tokens, data, and smart contracts, using blockchain technology. To do this, we need to grow participation, expand use cases, and both educate and inspire mainstream users.

By encouraging those at the forefront of the technology to engage in shared efforts and initiatives, we aim to encourage proactive collaboration across research, expertise, and innovation in the blockchain space.
why.title: Why it matters
why.content:
Many people are waking up to what cryptocurrencies can offer – how they can create monetary value. We now need them to witness other blockchain strengths.

At the UTXO Alliance, we believe that making it easier to transact across different blockchains will encourage broader use of the technology. To do this, we need to advocate interoperability across systems with similar outlooks – in this case, the UTXO model.

Ultimately, the importance of this initiative concerns the use of data. It all comes down to inputs and outputs – the amount of data used, the speed with which data is processed, transaction costs, and energy usage.
testimonials.title: Testimonials

testimonials.quotes.0.content: Mistakes are almost always of a sacred nature. Never try to correct them. On the contrary: rationalize them, understand them thoroughly. After that, it will be possible for you to sublimate them.

members.title: Who should join?
members.content:
Our UTXO Alliance members include some of the best and brightest blockchain minds out there. We’re looking for professionals and organisations that are developing the UTXO-based blockchain tools and techniques needed to evolve the standard; partners to take part in education, technical assistance, and information sessions.

Anyone that’s committed to furthering this transformative technology with the drive, knowledge, and passion to do so is welcome to join.
video.title: Deep dive into the UTXO Alliance
faqs.title: FREQUENTLY asked QUESTIONS

faqs.items.0.title: What is a UTXO?
faqs.items.0.content:
UTXO is an acronym for ‘Unspent Transaction Output’.

UTXOs are components in a blockchain transaction – the parts that will be used. They’re like stores of value or outputs waiting to be assigned.

In a transaction, instead of breaking down a set value (for example, 5 LTC) into smaller amounts (e.g. sending 3 LTC to Person A and keeping 2 LTC in a wallet), UTXOs treat each component as a separate output. Each is recorded as a separate ledger entry. They exist independently of each other. There’s no partial deduction.

Looking at UTXOs from another angle, they function like metadata. They hold information about each transaction: where it’s from, what’s in it, when it was created, etc.

faqs.items.1.title: Why an ‘Alliance’?
faqs.items.1.content: Our work here is a collective effort. However, we’re realistic in admitting that our motivations differ. We’re basically doubling down on what we have in common, rather than battling for blockchain supremacy.

faqs.items.2.title: How does it benefit individuals?
faqs.items.2.content:
Greater awareness of how UTXOs work will open more opportunities for individual blockchain users. For example, understanding how to manage UTXOs enables individuals to assert more control over their assets and optimise privacy during transactions.

There’s also a lot of mixed information out there. Creating an authoritative source of truth about the technology, its use cases, and applications is essential moving forward.

faqs.items.3.title: Why should companies and other organisations join?
faqs.items.3.content: Mass adoption of any technology requires immediate relevance and instant accessibility. But the more companies and organisations are aligned to the cause, the greater the UTXO Alliance’s credibility – and the more we can achieve. In many ways, the UTXO Alliance is a safe environment for validating and testing new ideas.

faqs.items.4.title: Where can I find more information about the UTXO Alliance?
faqs.items.4.content:
Start by signing up to join via the form below. Once you’ve done that, we’ll regularly send some useful and insightful information about the work we’re doing and ways you can get involved.

But here are a couple of articles to whet your appetite:

  • https://iohk.io/en/blog/posts/2021/03/11/cardanos-extended-utxo-accounting-model/
  • https://iohk.io/en/blog/posts/2021/03/12/cardanos-extended-utxo-accounting-model-part-2/

form.title: Join the alliance
form.content:
If you’ve read this far, chances are you’re serious about joining the UTXO Alliance. We just need a few more details from you.

So tell us...
